description.desc: Accelerated the file format conversion rate by 70%, by integrating WASM tools, cutting down the cloud charges to $0.
Designed and built blog summarizer, by reverse engineering ChatGPT API calls to send and receive AI responses, saving up to 5 hours per week of users.
Designed and built the official website of the club within a tight timeframe of 4 days, by leading a group of 4 developers and 2 designers.
